about_us.title: About Us
about_us.content: We are a streaming service that offers real-time access to channels from iTVT Group. You can access our application through the website: https://hub.itvt.xyz. You can also use the iTVT app on mobile devices, which you can find in the download section

media.title: Media
media.content: When playing a video, additional data may be downloaded to your device and sent to other servers

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: The browser may use cookies, to properly display the video

content.part1: Elements on a page can contain embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other sites behaves similar to how a user would visit a specific site directly.
content.part2: Sites may collect information about you, use cookies, attach additional third-party tracking systems, and monitor your interactions with embedded material, including tracking your interactions with embedded material if you have an account and are logged into that site.

keep_your_data.title: How long we keep your data ?

content.part1: If you leave a comment or write an email message, the content and metadata will be stored indefinitely. This allows us to easily respond to your message.
content.part2: If a user, has registered on our website (if any), we also store the personal information entered in the profile. Any user can review, correct, or delete his or her personal information at any time (except for the username, which cannot be changed). Site administrators can also view and modify this information.

rights_your_data.title: What rights do you have to your data ?
rights_your_data.content: If you have a user account or have sent a message through a form or email, you may request a file with an exported set of your personal information in our possession, including all of that provided by you. You may also request that we delete all of your personal data in our possession. This does not apply to any data that we are obliged to retain for administrative, legal or security reasons.

send_your_data.title: Where we will send your data ?
send_your_data.content: Your information such as IP Address, or System and Browser Version, may be sent to the site administrator for optimization and stability in the functioning of the site.

child_protection_policy.title: Child Protection and Abuse Prevention Policy – [iTVT App]

purpose_scope.title: 1. Purpose and Scope
purpose_scope.content: This policy aims to ensure the safety of children using our app and to prevent sexual abuse and other violations of their rights. It applies to all users, employees, moderators, and service providers working with our app, in accordance with the Google Play Families Policy (https://support.google.com/googleplay/android-developer/answer/9893335).

responsibilities.title: 2. Responsibilities
content: Ensure that app content and features are appropriate for children (if the app is directed to or accessible by children).
Comply with applicable child protection and privacy regulations (e.g., GDPR, COPPA).
Implement effective content moderation and abuse reporting mechanisms.

prohibited.title: 3. Prohibited Content and Actions
content: Content that sexualizes or is otherwise inappropriate towards minors.
Violent, degrading, or exploitative content involving children.
Collection of personal data from children without parental/legal guardian consent (if applicable).
Encouraging children to contact unknown individuals outside the app.

reporting.title: 4. Reporting and Response to Abuse
content: All users can report:
- Inappropriate content,
- Abuse,
- Suspicious accounts or behavior.
Reports are reviewed within 24 hours by our safety team. If a violation is confirmed:
- Content is removed,
- The user account may be suspended or banned,
- The case may be reported to the authorities.

moderation.title: 5. Content Control and Moderation
content: User-generated content (UGC) is subject to automated and manual moderation.
Children are not allowed to publicly share personal data (e.g., full names, facial images, contact numbers).

training.title: 6. Education and Training
content: All team members (including moderators and content creators) are regularly trained on:
- Digital child safety,
- Identifying and responding to threats,
- Standards compliant with the Google Play Families Policy.

data_protection.title: 7. Children’s Data Storage and Protection
content: Children’s data, if collected, is minimized and stored in line with privacy best practices.
We do not share children’s data with third parties without explicit parental/legal guardian consent.

review.title: 8. Policy Review and Updates
review.content: This policy is reviewed at least once every 12 months and updated as necessary to reflect changes in regulations or Google Play requirements.

contact.title: 9. Contact
content: For matters related to child safety,contact us at email: safety@itvt.xyz
We do not share children’s data with third parties without explicit parental/legal guardian consent.
